name: Infinitely Easy runner
description:
We present to your attention a series of games in an endless run.
New game "Infinitely Easy Runner", is gaining popularity among fans of endless running. This is a new, simpler version of the game "Infinitely Lucky runner". Hero is still able to run an infinite distance. Accelerates, dodge, jump, run away, most importantly avoid a collision with boxes and barrels. Thermonuclear waste, high voltage, explosive mixtures and bombs are waiting on the road. Different routes and new roads are waiting for you. Run as far as possible.
The game is easy to operate, with an easy and intuitive interface, you will understand at once what to do. One tap on the screen will allow you to jump over an obstacle. Along the way you can collect power-ups such as double, triple jump, coins and more. A variety of obstacles will cause you to pass the game again and again. Put your record. Bring a better result. Play with your friends on who will run. How far you can go the distance? Funny game, interesting graphics, light music.
This game is suitable for children and adults. Do you want to have fun - run)) ... only forward play great coach reactions, memory, fine motor skills of hands. And also it will develop a desire to win, to be the first to be the best.
Bored on the way to school or work? Are you waiting for friends who are late? Maybe you're stuck in a traffic jam? Or, your turn will not soon? Pick yourself a great mood, fun game. "Infinitely Easy Runner" is able to inspire in their journey. Jump, run, do the impossible - possible. Conquer new distance.
Interesting levels, the physical world carry you away for a long time.
The game will entice and boys and girls.

Play anytime and anywhere!

Enjoy!

Download now and share with your friends!

Thank you for the good reviews)
